pk.contender.earmouse

Class ManagerDetailsFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • pk.contender.earmouse.ManagerDetailsFragment

  • public class ManagerDetailsFragment
extends Fragment
    Implements a detailed view and installation option of user-selected Module in ModuleManagerActivity
    Author:
    Paul Klinkenberg

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  ManagerDetailsFragment.FetchModuleJsonFromServer
      Contacts a remote host, fetches the Module JSON for id, loads its data and sets up the UI.

        public void onButtonClick(View view)
        Installs the selected Module. After installation displays a Toast message and tells ModuleManagerActivity to update itself.
        Parameters:
        view - The View that received the click event
